divs: Sighting DetailsTRIANGULAR SHAPE. EACH SIDE 20FT APX BRIGHT LIGHTS, 4 OR 5+ LIGHTS, VERY LOW, APX 3-5 SECONDS AFTER SPOTTING (OUT OF NOWHERE) IT WAS GONE INSTANTLY WITH NO NOISE. VERY NEAT. WAS IN CAR WHEN SPOTTED DRIVING DOWN THE BLOCK OF OUR HOME AS IF IT WAS OVER OUR HOME
Summary: TRIANGULAR FAST MOVING. NO NOISE, VERY LOW ALTITUDE
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
